about_the_game:
Jump right into the world of Pox Nora with this bundle of ready to play decks. While the decks are designed to be playable out of the box, you can also adjust them once purchased.

This bundle includes 4 decks from the Protectorate factions featuring iconic themes from each faction:

  • The Tinkerers featuring the Constructs and their Dwarven creators from Ironfist Stronghold
  • Wrath of De'lim with the Outcast and his followers of K'thir Forest
  • Dancers in the Snow featuring the Ferren monks from Savage Tundra
  • The Collective with a common goal of uniting the denizens of Forglar Swamp

Jump right into the world of Pox Nora with this bundle of ready to play decks. While the decks are designed to be playable out of the box, you can also adjust them once purchased.

This bundle includes 4 decks from the Protectorate factions featuring iconic themes from each faction:

  • Wrath of De'lim with the Outcast and his followers of K'thir Forest
  • Dancers in the Snow featuring the Ferren monks from Savage Tundra
  • The Collective with a common goal of uniting the denizens of Forglar Swamp

mac_requirements.minimum:
OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
Processor: 2.4 GHz CPU or greater
Memory: 1 GB of RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI Video Card with 512 MB of video ram, with current video drivers
Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Protectorate Starter Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit)
Processor: 2.4 GHz CPU or greater
Memory: 1 GB of RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI Video Card with 512 MB of video ram, with current video drivers
Storage: 2 GB available space
